column4: i think my other pc froze, cuase I cant do anything except watch the text from xchat (it updates) and move my mouse :(
guys im so close to giving up on ubuntu :( it just froze and i cant do anything except move my mouse and watch what you say on xchat
somebody please help me :'(
my computer froze and I could only move my mouse and watch what you say on irc, other than that, everything's frozen :(
nothing, clicking some menus and going online
unless i locked it by accident, but i click the lock button and nothing happens
how can I unlock my pc, just to make sure i didnt
GUYS IM SO PISSED, my frickin computer froze, I mean, like, didn't freeze, I can move my mouse and see what you say on irc, but I cant go through menus, click icons, etc.
hit alt-f2
and use alt-f7 to get back
goes to shell, alt f1 to apt-f6 are ttys
log in as root and killall gdm
yeh
restart gdm
but i would look in /var/log/ to find out what crahsed and fix it first
yeh. dducko said it
yeh. do it.
/etc/init.d/gdm restart might do it too
try alt-f3 or alt-f4
use ext3, imho.
your HD is probably dying. buy a new one. they are cheap
